# Gemini CLI Tool - Required Dependencies
# Install with: pip install -r requirements.txt

# Gemini Web API client library
gemini-webapi>=1.0.0

# Rich - Beautiful terminal formatting and UI components
rich>=13.7.0

# Questionary - Interactive prompts
questionary>=2.0.0

# Prompt Toolkit - Advanced input with autocomplete
prompt_toolkit>=3.0.0

# Requests - HTTP library
questionary>=2.0.0

# WebSocket client for Chrome DevTools Protocol (REQUIRED for automatic mode)
websocket-client>=1.6.0

# Windows-specific: Required for DPAPI cookie decryption (legacy method)
pywin32>=306

# Required for AES-GCM cookie decryption (legacy method)
pycryptodome>=3.20.0

# Optional: For grab_cookies.py alternative
selenium>=4.15.0
